charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was helping Steven
with his training one day while Roxanne
watched on.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_0200_:
I know it was a last-minute invitation,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but I really
appreciate your showing up!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_0300_:
Thanks to you, I think I’ve got the hang of battling
in this outfit.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_0400_:
This is the first time I’ve witnessed a sync stone
ultimate’s power up close... It certainly does hold
incredible strength!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_0500_:
And of course, you and Metagross are as skilled
as ever, Steven!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_0800_:
Well, it seemed like you weren’t giving many
orders to Metagross... That stood out as odd
to me.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_1000_: The reason for that lies in Metagross’s brains.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_1200_:
Metagross’s brains are said to be more intelligent
than a supercomputer.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_1300_:
That’s why I put a good deal of trust in
Metagross’s own decisions.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_1400_: But I don’t just leave everything to it.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_1500_:
It’s the instructions I give at critical moments that
lead us to victory.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_0301_1600_: So you’re the one in the lead.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_0401_1700_:
Yes, that’s how things should be with a Trainer
and a Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_0401_1800_:
They should trust and respect each other...just like
me and Metagross!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_0402_2000_:
I’m happy to hear the compliment, both for me and
Metagross!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2100_:
But that strategy only works because you trust
each other so much!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2200_:
Metagross may be used to making its own
decisions, but it does follow your lead when it
really counts!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2300_:
Even if the result is the same—the Pokémon
deciding what to do on its own—
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2400_:
this is totally different from a Pokémon that simply
refuses to listen to an underqualified Trainer!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2500_:
I think the reason we’re able to battle effectively
together like this...
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2600_:
is because we’ve known each other for so long,
ever since it was a Beldum!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2800_:
it felt like destiny—an instant sensation telling me,
“This Pokémon is the one!”
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_2900_:
And now that I’ve awakened to the power of the
arc suit, I can say with confidence that my feeling
was correct!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3000_:
My partner Metagross is so understanding and
dependable...or to put it simply...
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3100_: my Metagross is truly strong and cool!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3200_:
And to prove that we’re the strongest sync pair
there is right now...
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3300_:
I plan to keep polishing our skills until they gleam
even brighter!
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3400_:
I’m sure that sync pairs have an absolutely infinite
capacity to shine.
charaepi_ch0090_90_daigo/2301_1201_3500_:
And I’m looking forward to seeing just how far
you’re able to take your own sparkle in the future!
